original_text: So all the men cut branches and they followed Abimelech. They put the branches around the strong building. Then they brought fire to burn down the building. There were about 1,000 men and women in the tower of Shechem. They all died in the fire.
korean_text: 모든 백성들도 각각 나뭇가지를 찍어서 아비멜렉을 따라 보루 위에 놓고 그것들이 얹혀 있는 보루에 불을 놓으매 세겜 망대에 있는 사람들이 다 죽었으니 남녀가 약 천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: So all the men cut branches
They put the branches around the strong building
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 가지들을 견고한 건물 주위에 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: There were about 1,000 men and women
They all died in the fire
